00021 #ifndef __EINTERNAL_H
00022 #define __EINTERNAL_H
00023 
00024 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00025 
00026 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00027 
00028 
00029 class EInternal : public QMCalculator
00030 {
00031 public:
00032 
00033     EInternal() { };
00034    ~EInternal() { };
00035 
00036     string Identify() { return "EInternal"; }
00037     void Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options);
00038     void ParseEnergiesXML(Topology *top, Property *options);
00039     bool EvaluateFrame(Topology *top);
00040 
00041 private:
00042 
00043     map<string, double> _seg_U_cC_nN_e;
00044     map<string, double> _seg_U_nC_nN_e;
00045     map<string, double> _seg_U_cN_cC_e;
00046 
00047     map<string, double> _seg_U_cC_nN_h;
00048     map<string, double> _seg_U_nC_nN_h;
00049     map<string, double> _seg_U_cN_cC_h;
00050 
00051     map<string, bool>   _seg_has_e;
00052     map<string, bool>   _seg_has_h;
00053 
00054     map<string, bool>   _has_seg;
00055 
00056 };
00057 
00058 void EInternal::Initialize(Topology *top, Property *options) {
00059 
00060     string key = "options.einternal";
00061 
00062     /* ---- OPTIONS.XML Structure -----
00063      *
00064      * <einternal>
00065      *
00066      *      <energiesXML>ENERGIES.XML</energiesXML>
00067      *
00068      * </einternal>
00069      *
00070      */
00071 
00072     this->ParseEnergiesXML(top, options);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void EInternal::ParseEnergiesXML(Topology *top, Property *opt) {
00076 
00077     string key = "options.einternal";
00078     string energiesXML = opt->get(key+".energiesXML").as<string> ();
00079 
00080     cout << endl
00081          << "... ... Site, reorg. energies from " << energiesXML << ". "
00082          << flush;
00083 
00084     Property alloc;
00085     load_property_from_xml(alloc, energiesXML.c_str());
00086 
00087     /* --- ENERGIES.XML Structure ---
00088      *
00089      * <topology>
00090      *
00091      *     <molecules>
00092      *          <molecule>
00093      *          <name></name>
00094      *
00095      *          <segments>
00096      *
00097      *              <segment>
00098      *              <name></name>
00099      *
00100      *              <!-- U_sG_sG, s->state, G->geometry !-->
00101      *
00102      *              <U_cC_nN_e></U_cC_nN_e>
00103      *              <U_cC_nN_h></U_cC_nN_h>
00104      *
00105      *              <U_nC_nN_e></U_nC_nN_e>
00106      *              <U_nC_nN_h></U_nC_nN_h>
00107      *
00108      *              <U_cN_cC_e></U_cN_cC_e>
00109      *              <U_cN_cC_h></U_cN_cC_h>
00110      *
00111      *              </segment>
00112      *
00113      *              <segment>
00114      *                  ...
00115      *
00116      */
00117 
00118     key = "topology.molecules.molecule";
00119     list<Property*> mols = alloc.Select(key);
00120     list<Property*> ::iterator molit;
00121     for (molit = mols.begin(); molit != mols.end(); ++molit) {
00122 
00123         key = "segments.segment";
00124         list<Property*> segs = (*molit)->Select(key);
00125         list<Property*> ::iterator segit;
00126 
00127         for (segit = segs.begin(); segit != segs.end(); ++segit) {
00128 
00129             string segName = (*segit)->get("name").as<string> ();
00130 
00131             bool has_seg = true;
00132             bool has_e = false;
00133             bool has_h = false;
00134 
00135             double U_cC_nN_e = 0.0;
00136             double U_cC_nN_h = 0.0;
00137             double U_nC_nN_e = 0.0;
00138             double U_nC_nN_h = 0.0;
00139             double U_cN_cC_e = 0.0;
00140             double U_cN_cC_h = 0.0;
00141 
00142             if ( (*segit)->exists("U_cC_nN_e") &&
00143                  (*segit)->exists("U_nC_nN_e") &&
00144                  (*segit)->exists("U_cN_cC_e")    ) {
00145 
00146                 U_cC_nN_e = (*segit)->get("U_cC_nN_e").as< double > ();
00147                 U_nC_nN_e = (*segit)->get("U_nC_nN_e").as< double > ();
00148                 U_cN_cC_e = (*segit)->get("U_cN_cC_e").as< double > ();
00149 
00150                 has_e = true;
00151             }
00152 
00153             if ( (*segit)->exists("U_cC_nN_h") &&
00154                  (*segit)->exists("U_nC_nN_h") &&
00155                  (*segit)->exists("U_cN_cC_h")    ) {
00156 
00157                 U_cC_nN_h = (*segit)->get("U_cC_nN_h").as< double > ();
00158                 U_nC_nN_h = (*segit)->get("U_nC_nN_h").as< double > ();
00159                 U_cN_cC_h = (*segit)->get("U_cN_cC_h").as< double > ();
00160 
00161                 has_h = true;
00162             }
00163 
00164             _seg_U_cC_nN_e[segName] = U_cC_nN_e;
00165             _seg_U_nC_nN_e[segName] = U_nC_nN_e;
00166             _seg_U_cN_cC_e[segName] = U_cN_cC_e;
00167             _seg_has_e[segName] = has_e;
00168 
00169             _seg_U_cC_nN_h[segName] = U_cC_nN_h;
00170             _seg_U_nC_nN_h[segName] = U_nC_nN_h;
00171             _seg_U_cN_cC_h[segName] = U_cN_cC_h;
00172             _seg_has_h[segName] = has_h;
00173             _has_seg[segName] = has_seg;
00174         }
00175     }
00176 }
00177 
00178 bool EInternal::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00179 
00180     vector< Segment* > ::iterator sit;
00181     int count = 0;
00182     for (sit = top->Segments().begin(); sit < top->Segments().end(); ++sit) {
00183 
00184         string segName = (*sit)->getName();
00185 
00186         try {
00187             bool has_seg = _has_seg.at(segName);
00188         }
00189         catch (out_of_range) {
00190             cout << endl << "... ... WARNING: No energy information for seg ["
00191                          << segName << "]. Skipping... ";
00192             continue;
00193         }
00194 
00195         ++count;
00196 
00197         if (_seg_has_e[segName]) {
00198 
00199             double u  = _seg_U_cC_nN_e[segName];
00200             double l1 = _seg_U_nC_nN_e[segName];
00201             double l2 = _seg_U_cN_cC_e[segName];
00202             bool has_e = true;
00203 
00204             (*sit)->setU_cC_nN(u, -1);
00205             (*sit)->setU_nC_nN(l1, -1);
00206             (*sit)->setU_cN_cC(l2, -1);
00207             (*sit)->setHasState(has_e, -1);
00208         }
00209 
00210         if (_seg_has_h[segName]) {
00211 
00212             double u  = _seg_U_cC_nN_h[segName];
00213             double l1 = _seg_U_nC_nN_h[segName];
00214             double l2 = _seg_U_cN_cC_h[segName];
00215             bool has_h = true;
00216 
00217             (*sit)->setU_cC_nN(u, +1);
00218             (*sit)->setU_nC_nN(l1, +1);
00219             (*sit)->setU_cN_cC(l2, +1);
00220             (*sit)->setHasState(has_h, +1);
00221         }
00222     }
00223 
00224     cout << endl
00225          << "... ... Read in site, reorg. energies for " 
00226          << count << " segments. " << flush;
00227 
00228 
00229     return 1;
00230 }
00231
